hero.description: An AI-powered platform for Japanese SMEs. From translation and digital distribution to partner discovery, everything runs in a single workflow.
hero.note: Unifies digital outreach and partner discovery for global expansion, with AI supporting market analysis and recommendations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Make global expansion easier for SMEs
benefits: Unified distribution across social media and Google Maps

highlights.title: Secure transactions
highlights.description: ISO-aligned and compliant with international standards

highlights.title: Global network
highlights.description: Support through JETRO, chambers of commerce, and Rotary Club partnerships

features.title: Service Overview
features.subtitle: Everything SMEs need in one dashboard

items.title: Multilingual translation tools
items.description: Automatically translate product and company information to support global expansion.

items.title: Multi-channel distribution
items.description: Manage publishing to Instagram, Facebook, Google Maps, X, and more.

items.title: Partner matching
items.description: Match with trusted overseas partners for safe, efficient expansion.

items.title: Payment support
items.description: Reduce transaction costs and time with secure international payments.

items.title: AI support
items.description: AI-assisted answers, market analysis, and business guidance.

items.title: Company verification & structuring
items.description: Improve credibility and presentation with structured company review.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you are ready
pricing.note: A product experience that doubles as a sales tool. The more you use it, the more value you unlock.

plans.name: Free
plans.description: Try it out for a week
features: Up to 10 partner searches in 1 week
Basic AI support (up to 3 per day)

partners.title: Partners & Support Organizations
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with trusted institutions to help you expand globally with confidence.

items.name: NEXI

items.name: Expert Network
items.description: Comprehensive support from experts in international law, logistics, and taxation.

about.title: Security & Trust
about.description: GBES maintains the highest security standards and transparency to protect your business data and transactions with international compliance.
features: Transparent data handling and clear contracts
Compliance with domestic and international regulations

cards.title: ISO-aligned security

cards.title: Full transparency
cards.description: Clear disclosure of all transactions and contract terms.

cards.title: Legal compliance
cards.description: Fully compliant with domestic and international regulations.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to get started? Reach out today and build something great together.

footer.description: Empowering Japanese SMEs to expand globally with AI-powered solutions.

chat.title: Export & Import Expert Chat
chat.subtitle: Ask us anything about Japanese export/import operations
chat.example: Example: "What are the procedures for exporting food to the US?"
chat.errorDescription: Failed to send your message. Please try again later.

businessChat.pageSubtitle: Keep partnership conversations organized with secure, deal-focused messaging.
businessChat.newChatToastDescription: Search for a partner in Partner Search to begin a conversation.
businessChat.noConversations: No conversations yet. Start a new chat to begin.
businessChat.recommendationCopy: Send a summarized offer with timelines and SLA.
businessChat.emptyPrompt: Start the conversation with a clear goal and timeline.
businessChat.partnerDetailsFallback: Select a conversation to view partner details.
businessChat.messagePlaceholder: Write a message with clear milestones and expectations...

partnerSearch.title: Partner Search
partnerSearch.subtitle: Discover trusted business partners worldwide and create new opportunities for growth.
partnerSearch.searchPlaceholder: Search by company name, industry, services...
partnerSearch.scrapePlaceholder:
Enter website URLs (one per line)
Example:
https://example.com
https://company2.com
partnerSearch.scrapeDescription: Company information will be automatically extracted from the provided websites.
partnerSearch.scrapeUseAiHint: Improves industry, specialties, and contact details if available.
partnerSearch.scrapeResultsEmpty: No companies were added from these URLs.
partnerSearch.scrapeConfirmNote: Review the results first. Choose to add them as-is or re-scrape and replace existing entries.
partnerSearch.advancedFiltersDescription: Select industry categories and regions to refine your search results.
tips: • Combine multiple conditions for better results
• You can also search with keywords like "Manufacturing Asia"
• If no companies are found, try "Add Companies"
partnerSearch.noResultsDefault: No companies matched your search criteria.
partnerSearch.noResultsTipScrape: Try using the "Add Companies" button to scrape relevant company websites.
partnerSearch.noResultsTipChangeQuery: Try changing your search terms or add new companies from external data sources.
partnerSearch.emptyState: Enter a search keyword to find partner companies.
partnerSearch.chatToastDescription: Open Messages to start a chat with {{company}}.
partnerSearch.chatAuthRequiredDescription: Please sign in to start a chat.
partnerSearch.chatUnavailableDescription: This company does not have a chat-enabled account yet.
partnerSearch.chatSelfDescription: You are viewing your own company profile.
partnerSearch.chatErrorDescription: We couldn't open a chat right now. Please try again.
partnerSearch.inquirySubtitle: The message below will be sent to the company's contact email. Please review and edit before sending.
partnerSearch.inquiryNote: Your contact information (name, email, company, etc.) will be included with this message.
partnerSearch.inquiryFooterNote: This message will be sent directly to the company's registered email address, and their reply will be delivered to your email address.

toasts.loginRequiredDescription: Please log in to send partnership inquiries
toasts.scrapeLoginRequiredDescription: Please log in to scrape company websites.
toasts.inquirySentDescription: Your partnership inquiry has been sent successfully
toasts.sendErrorDescription: An error occurred while sending your inquiry
toasts.scrapePreviewDescription: Previewed {{count}} company records. Confirm to add them.
toasts.scrapeErrorDescription: An error occurred while scraping website data.

partnerSearch.inquiryTemplate:
Dear {{company}} Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am reaching out to explore potential partnership opportunities between our organizations. After reviewing your company profile, I believe there may be synergies that could benefit both parties.

I would be particularly interested in discussing:
• Partnership structures and terms
• Mutual benefits of collaboration
• Future business development opportunities

I would welcome the opportunity to schedule a call or meeting to discuss this further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
